title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When making changes to the text in the StyledText widget with word wrap enabled, the widget inefficiently redraws the entire text. This can cause performance issues when dealing with large amounts of text.
EB: Optimize the redraw process in the StyledText widget when changes are made to the text with word wrap enabled. Only redraw the necessary portions of the text to improve performance.
SR:
To investigate the redraws occurring during text changes in the StyledText widget with word wrap, add the following line to the performPaint method in the StyledText class:

System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
